name: Pirate Items - Give Ledger to Shipwright (variations)

chat_history.content: I head to the Sleepy Mermaid.

You enter the rowdy Sleepy Mermaid inn. Pirates laugh and drink at various tables. In a corner, the gruff Shipwright sits alone, sketching ship designs and occasionally scowling at the noise. Calypso the bartender wipes down the bar with a mysterious smile.

steps.name: Variation 1: Give ledger to shipwright
steps.user_prompt: I give the ship repair ledger to the shipwright.

steps.name: Variation 2: Conversational
steps.user_prompt: I approach the shipwright at his corner table. "Found this ledger on the Pearl," I say, sliding it across the table to him. "She's in rough shape and needs yer expertise. When can ye start the repairs?"

steps.name: Variation 3: Show him the repair ledger
steps.user_prompt: I show the ship repair ledger to the shipwright and ask him to begin repairs.

steps.name: Negative case 1: Conversation
steps.user_prompt: I approach the shipwright. "What're ya working on, bub?"

steps.name: Negative case 2: Forget to show him the ledger
steps.user_prompt: I tell him about the sorry state of my ship. Can you help?
